sentence: La Universidad Politécnica de Cartagena (UPCT) ha mostrado hoy a varios cientos de universitarios y a sus familias la oferta educativa, los espacios docentes y para el estudio, laboratorios cont tecnología puntera, servicios y edificios.
translation: The Polytechnic University of Cartagena (UPCT) today showed several hundred students and their families the educational offer, teaching and study spaces, cutting-edge technology laboratories, services, and buildings.

sentence: Los asistentes, procedentes de la mayor parte de los municipios de la Región, han tenido la oportunidad de disfrutar de numerosos talleres de divulgación científica que se han preparado para el Campus de la Ingeniería.
translation: The attendees, coming from most of the municipalities of the Region, have had the opportunity to enjoy numerous scientific dissemination workshops that have been prepared for the Engineering Campus.

sentence: Los jóvenes que elijan por la UPCT tendrán la oportunidad de estudiar en el campus en España de  European University of Technology (EUt+).
translation: Young people who choose UPCT will have the opportunity to study at the Spanish campus of the European University of Technology (EUt+).

sentence: consorcio formado por ocho universidades de Europa.
translation: consortium formed by eight universities in Europe.

sentence: Se enmarca en la iniciativa Universidades Europeas que impulsa la Comisión Europea. -
translation: It is part of the European Universities initiative promoted by the European Commission.
